channel.title: Need Help With First Server
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape Community!
I am new to rsps, and am working on my first one.
I am using this client/server : [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443234.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443234.0.html[/url]
I followed the instructions where it said to edit the "server = " line, and compiled the client, then opened the server and ran the client and got "error connecting to server".
Then I found a line in the server.java file that said something like "if playerrights = 2 then connect to server ___ " so I changed the original server = back to default and changed this new one to my server. This worked for me, but i tried to run the client on my other computer and it failed!
When I changed both server codes to mine nothing worked.
Help ? :confused:

item.title: Need Help With First Server
item.dc:creator: @abethalos abethalos
item.description:
@abethalos wrote:

Ok, basically the problem is that no other computer than my own can use the client while the server is running.

So what I’m saying is…

The computer running the server is the only one that the client will work on! I need it so that other people can play it!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With First Server
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

Please post pics or a video cause I don’t understand your problem. Too hard to follow sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With First Server
item.dc:creator: @abethalos abethalos
item.description:
@abethalos wrote:

Hello Moparscape Community!

I am new to rsps, and am working on my first one.

I am using this client/server : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443234.0.html

I followed the instructions where it said to edit the "server = " line, and compiled the client, then opened the server and ran the client and got “error connecting to server”.

Then I found a line in the server.java file that said something like "if playerrights = 2 then connect to server ___ " so I changed the original server = back to default and changed this new one to my server. This worked for me, but i tried to run the client on my other computer and it failed!

When I changed both server codes to mine nothing worked.

Help ?

Read full topic
